Joint status report and Proposed Briefing Schedule. Filed by Jeffrey David Gerrish of Skadden Arps Slate Meagher & Flom, LLP on behalf of United States Steel Corporation. (Gerrish, Jeffrey) (Entered: 05/15/2009)
Statement of Issues. Filed by Jeffrey David Gerrish of Skadden Arps Slate Meagher & Flom, LLP on behalf of United States Steel Corporation. (Gerrish, Jeffrey) (Entered: 05/15/2009)

Unopposed Motion to consolidate case(s) 09-00086, 09-00083 with lead case 09-00086. Responses due by 6/10/2009. Filed by Jeffrey David Gerrish of Skadden Arps Slate Meagher & Flom, LLP on behalf of United States Steel Corporation.(Gerrish, Jeffrey) (Entered: 05/21/2009)

Order entered on 5/28/2009 granting Motion to consolidate cases. ORDERED that (1) Court No. 09-00086 and Court No. 09-00083 are hereby consolidated (2) the briefing schedule set forth in Joint Status Report and Proposed Scheduling Order entered in Court No. 09-00083 shall apply to consolidated cases and (3) Defendant's page limit for its brief is hereby expanded to the total number of pages it would have had if the cases had not been consolidated (Related Doc # 23 ). (Cheevers, Casey) (Entered: 05/28/2009)

Scheduling Order entered on 5/28/2009. As per the consolidation order entered on May 28, 2009, the scheduling order entered in Court No. 09-00083 shall apply to Court No. 09-00086. Plaintiffs and Plaintiff-Intervenors shall file their Rule 56.2 motions by 7/16/2009. Defendant's Response shall be filed by 9/14/2009. Plaintiffs and Plaintiff-Intervenors' replies shall be due by 10/14/2009. Motion for oral argument shall be filed by 10/14/2009(Cheevers, Casey) (Entered: 05/28/2009)

Form 18 Notice of Termination of Access to Business Proprietary Information filed on behalf of Dennis A. George as a consultant. Filed by Jeffrey David Gerrish of Skadden Arps Slate Meagher & Flom, LLP on behalf of United States Steel Corporation. (Gerrish, Jeffrey) (Entered: 07/08/2009)

Consent Motion for extension of time until 9/16/2009 to file opening briefs. Responses due by 8/3/2009. Filed by Jeffrey David Gerrish of Skadden Arps Slate Meagher & Flom, LLP on behalf of United States Steel Corporation.(Gerrish, Jeffrey) (Entered: 07/13/2009)

Amended Scheduling Order entered on 7/14/2009 granting Motion for extension of time and amendment of the scheduling order. (Related Doc # 27 ). ORDERED that plaintiffs and plaintiff-intervenor shall file their opening briefs on or before 9/16/2009 and that defendant's response shall be filed on or before 11/16/2009 and that plaintiffs and plaintiff-intervenor shall file their reply briefs on or before 12/16/2009. Any Motions for oral argument shall be due by 12/16/2009. (Cheevers, Casey) (Entered: 07/14/2009)

Form 17 Business Proprietary Information Certification filed on behalf of Stephen J. Narkin, Soo-Mi Rhee and Ying Lin. Filed by Jeffrey David Gerrish of Skadden Arps Slate Meagher & Flom, LLP on behalf of United States Steel Corporation. (Gerrish, Jeffrey) (Entered: 07/27/2009)
Motion to remand case. Responses due by 9/23/2009. Filed by John Todor of U.S. Department of Justice on behalf of United States.(Todor, John) (Entered: 09/03/2009)

Order entered on 9/10/2009 granting Motion to remand case. ORDERED that the Department of Commerce shall file its remand results within 30 days from the date of this order (Related Doc # 30 ). (Cheevers, Casey) (Entered: 09/10/2009)

Consent Motion for extension of time until 10/20/2009 to File Remand Results. Responses due by 10/26/2009. Filed by John Todor of U.S. Department of Justice on behalf of United States.(Todor, John) (Entered: 10/06/2009)

Order entered on 10/8/2009 granting Motion for extension of time. ORDERED that defendant shall file its remand results in this case no later than October 20, 2009 (Related Doc # 32 ). (Cheevers, Casey) (Entered: 10/08/2009)
